params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.pubsub_topic
params.description: The Pub/Sub topic where notifications like the job state changes will be published. This topic exist in the same project as the job and billings will be charged to this project. If not specified, no Pub/Sub messages will be sent. Topic format: projects/{project}/topics/{topic}.

params.name: data.message
params.description: The attribute requirements of messages to be sent to this Pub/Sub topic. Without this field, no message will be sent.

methods.name: getPubsubTopic
methods.description:
The Pub/Sub topic where notifications like the job state changes will be published. This topic exist in the same project as the job and billings will be charged to this project.

If not specified, no Pub/Sub messages will be sent. Topic format: projects/{project}/topics/{topic}.

Generated from protobuf field string pubsub_topic = 1;
